nodes.bodyText: Instead of maybeFromControlPlane, how about fromControlPlaneListener

I don't think this is quite right.  The flag should be set based on whether we're in the control plane listener OR the inter-broker listener.  It's much more common to use a separate inter-broker listener, than to use a fully separate control plane listener.

nodes.bodyText:
From the above:

if we have a control plane listener, the privileged listener is that one, and only that one
otherwise, if we have inter-broker listeners, only those are privileged,
otherwise, all listeners are privileged

We should have this in the JavaDoc for SocketServer
